entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having entered the Forbidden Forest only once and hoping not to do so again. (Excerpt: 'Harry had entered it only once...')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, mentioned as twirling his wand nervously and asking about werewolves in the Forest. (Excerpt: 'Ron had never been into the Forbidden Forest before...')

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: A teacher, mentioned as bounding into the room and speaking to the class about the danger having passed. (Excerpt: 'Lockhart bounded into the room...')

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: A type of creature mentioned as being in the Forest and being all right. (Excerpt: 'The centaurs are all right...')

entities.name: unicorns
entities.description: A type of creature mentioned as being in the Forest. (Excerpt: 'The unicorns.'

entities.name: werewolves
entities.description: A type of creature mentioned as possibly being in the Forest. (Excerpt: 'aren’t there – aren’t there supposed to be werewolves...')
